title: Installation issue: migraphx 4.2.0 fails to build with "fatal error: 'Python.h' file not found"
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

@arjun-raj-kuppala @srekolam

### Steps to reproduce the issue

As you can see below there is a Python installation done by Spack available. It seems to me that it isn't used, though.

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack find %gcc@10.3.0
==> 109 installed packages
-- linux-centos7-zen2 / gcc@10.3.0 ------------------------------
atmi@4.2.0                   curl@7.76.1      hip-rocclr@4.2.0    libedit@3.1-20210216  libxcb@1.14        nlohmann-json@3.9.1     py-msgpack@1.0.2        rocminfo@4.2.0          xxd-standalone@8.2.1201
autoconf@2.69                diffutils@3.7    hipblas@4.2.0       libelf@0.8.13         libxdmcp@1.1.2     numactl@2.0.14          py-pybind11@2.6.2       rocprim@4.2.0           xz@5.2.5
autoconf-archive@2019.01.06  expat@2.3.0      hipcub@4.2.0        libffi@3.3            libxext@1.3.3      openblas@0.3.15         py-pyyaml@5.3.1         rocsolver@4.2.0         z3@4.8.9
automake@1.16.3              findutils@4.8.0  hipfft@4.2.0        libiconv@1.16         libxml2@2.9.10     openssh@7.4p1           py-setuptools@50.3.2    rocsparse@4.2.0         zlib@1.2.11
berkeley-db@18.1.40          flex@2.6.3       hipfort@4.2.0       libidn2@2.3.0         libyaml@0.2.5      openssl@1.1.1k          py-virtualenv@16.7.6    sqlite@3.35.5           zstd@1.5.0
binutils@2.36.1              gcc@10.3.0       hipify-clang@4.2.0  libmd@1.0.3           llvm-amdgpu@4.2.0  pcre2@10.36             py-wheel@0.36.2         tar@1.34
bison@3.7.6                  gdbm@1.19        hipsparse@4.2.0     libpciaccess@0.16     m4@1.4.19          perl@5.34.0             python@3.8.10           texinfo@6.5
blaze@3.8                    gettext@0.21     hsa-rocr-dev@4.2.0  libpthread-stubs@0.4  mesa18@18.3.6      perl-data-dumper@2.173  readline@8.1            util-linux-uuid@2.36.2
boost@1.73.0                 git@2.31.1       hsakmt-roct@4.2.0   libsigsegv@2.13       miopen-hip@4.2.0   perl-file-which@1.22    rocblas@4.2.0           util-macros@1.19.1
bzip2@1.0.8                  glproto@1.4.17   hwloc@2.4.1         libtool@2.4.6         mpc@1.1.0          pkgconf@1.7.4           rocfft@4.2.0            xcb-proto@1.14.1
cmake@3.17.5                 gmp@6.2.1        inputproto@2.3.2    libunistring@0.9.10   mpfr@4.1.0         protobuf@3.12.2         rocm-clang-ocl@4.2.0    xextproto@7.3.0
cmake@3.20.3                 half@1.12.0      kbproto@1.0.7       libx11@1.7.0          msgpack-c@3.1.1    py-mako@1.1.4           rocm-cmake@4.2.0        xproto@7.0.31
comgr@4.2.0                  hip@4.2.0        libbsd@0.11.3       libxau@1.0.8          ncurses@6.2        py-markupsafe@1.1.1     rocm-device-libs@4.2.0  xtrans@1.3.5


$ spack spec migraphx@4.2.0 ^cmake@3.17.5 %gcc@10.3.0

--------------------------------

    ^cmake@3.17.5%gcc@10.3.0
```
